markdownRemark.html:
For my senior capstone project I created a new data visualization of crowding on buses at the MBTA. The Bus Crowding Explorer, will help service planners identify causes of and solutions to crowding on the bus network.

How is crowding measured?

Crowding measurement is.. complex. On the most basic level, bus crowding is defined by the MBTA service delivery policy as a function of occupancy of vehicles

Why crowding matters

Limitations of this tool

Special thanks to:
  • Arthur Prokosch, project management and support
  • Laura Riegel, opinion-giver and transit data expert
